# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **scale**: The scale of the effect.
- **shadingImage**: The image to use as the height field.

items.description: The image to use as the height field.
